description: Save Patreon content you have access to.
name: patreon-archiver

scripts.check-formatting: prettier -c '.*/**/*.json' '.*/**/*.y*ml' './**/*.md' './**/*.toml' './**/*.y*ml' ./.prettierrc && poetry run yapf -rd patreon_archiver .stubs test
scripts.fix-pluggy: touch "$(poetry run python -c 'import inspect, os, pluggy; print(os.path.dirname(inspect.getabsfile(pluggy)))')/py.typed"
scripts.format: prettier -w '.*/**/*.json' '.*/**/*.y*ml' './**/*.md' './**/*.toml' './**/*.y*ml' ./.prettierrc && poetry run yapf -ri patreon_archiver tests
scripts.qa: yarn mypy && yarn ruff && yarn check-spelling && yarn check-formatting
scripts.ruff: poetry run ruff check docs patreon_archiver
